narrative.title: Marmarica Division - 1940Q2
narrative.situation: Italian Infantry Division (Binary - Autotrasportabile) deployed in North Africa - Libya during 1940Q2.
narrative.objectives: Static defense and limited offensive operations in North African desert terrain
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: Coastal desert (Bardia escarpment) - rocky, arid, limited water

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Autotrasportabile organization - could be transported by truck when vehicles available
Adapted for desert operations with animal transport backup
Extensive use of mule transport for rough terrain

environment.terrain_type: Coastal desert (Bardia escarpment) - rocky, arid, limited water
